support request/reply - request/reply http://www.mulesoft.org/documentation/display/current/routing+message+processors#routingmessageprocessors-requestreply mockups here: http://corp.wiki.mulesource.com/display/wp/request-reply#request-reply-mockups

cannot import studio project git without errors - steps reproduce: 1. create simple mule studio project (for instance: echo example) 2. push github, pull/clone repository local instance 3. open brand new workspace 4. goto import/git/projects git 5. select local copy github repository 6. select import existing projects 7. select project created 8. import fails due missing directories (see screenshot) note import --> mule project works recognise project managed git cannot commit changes. blocking work examples. edit: workaround: perform clean operation project.
changes java code get hot deployed - java source changes get picked right automatically (see studio-381) however, even redeploy triggered latest java changes deployed

unable add response creating second flow mflow - unable add response creating second flow. steps reproduce: 1) open studio create project existing template: order discounter. 2) mflow file create another flow. drag drop http rq-rs, echo, flow reference, router component, echo file, file. 3) try add response (echo component) like one displayed template flow. unable add response, instead lets add component http soap component. see screen shot.

namespaces xml view removed remove elements kind - add element remove it, reference schema file removed xml namespaces. steps reproduce: 1.- create project studio flow go global elements tab. 2.- add example global jetty endpoint default values. 3.- go xml view check xml code endpoint reference mule-jetty.xsd namespaces 4.- go back global elements tab delete endpoint. issue: go back xml view, code endpoint ti reference mule-jetty.xsd still jetty element flow global elements tab. careful implementing reference namespaces remve instance element kind flow global element global endpoint connector, reference element kind (ex: jetty element) reason namespace there.
would save time given option create class addition selecting existing class inside widget dialog box (e.g., component) - add button classfieldeditor create class inline.

view class code clicking class name displayed widget dialog box - currently, view class code (e.g., component) specified widget configuration, leave dialog box find it. desirable feature would view class code (as separate tab editor ) clicking class name displayed widget dialog box.

reference subflow get lost changing subflow name (exception strategy) - steps reproduce: 1.- create project studio flow sub-flow 2.- go flow properties window set exception subflow ref combo subflow have. clic ok. 3.- change name subflow. 4.- open flow properties window, subflow ref blank expected behavior: reference preserved matters user decides change subflow name.

studio lot smarter handling logic expressions. i'd rather see and, or, filters palette - seems could single filter element flow control section one dialog allows people select expression (this works wildcard regex) section allow user add new filters and, not. think provides much better usability single filter element whole palette. makes working logic filters natural user. i.e.it feels odd start filter configure expressions

response section displayed - config follows: <flow name="ticketflowflow1" doc:name="ticketflowflow1"> <composite-source> <http:inbound-endpoint exchange-pattern="request-response" host="localhost" port="8081" doc:name="http"/> <vm:inbound-endpoint exchange-pattern="request-response" path="helloworld" responsetimeout="10000" mimetype="text/plain" doc:name="vm"/> </composite-source> <component class="com.mulesoft.component1" doc:name="java"/> <http:outbound-endpoint exchange-pattern="request-response" host="localhost" port="8081" doc:name="http"/> <response> <component class="com.mulesoft.component2" doc:name="java"/> </response> </flow> response displayed (see pic attached)

able drag drop composite source poll response elements - able drag drop composite source poll response elements flow. correct: let user able drop composite source poll there. dropping response elements empty response box created xml configuration written: <response/> attaching screen shot.

specification global endpoint connector created global elements table, called confusing - usability issue: specification global endpoint connector created global elements table, called confusing. steps reproduce: 1. create ftp global endpoint. 2. create ftp connector. type name global elements table (for name already jira opened that). type specify global endpoint connector. nowadays think type useless, say anything user. says "ftp (ee)" global endpoint connector. happens rest global endpoints connectors pretty confusing!!!

executing simple lookup table configuration showing error message - created java xml mapping configured lookup table 2 fields: subject(key) email. executed preview error message displayed: "message:transform failed!" (see attached screenshot)

unable create new mappings using new excel format xlsx - unable create new mapping using excel spreadsheet new format .xlsx reproduce: - create new mapping - input: select ms excel - add .xlsx spreadsheet attached issue - output: select anything - click finish button (error displayed error log) see attached screenshot error.

multiple xml validation errors studio editor - 1. element jax-ws service allowed child element http. oh, allowed, often times makes perfect sense child element rather subsequent one. false alarm. 2. flow start inbound endpoint no, to. 3. response allowed child element http course, allowed :)
undo option (command + z / ctrl + z ) work remove global element - steps reproduce: 1.- go global elements tab create element. 2.- remove it. 3.- press ctrl + z command + z issue: element appears

suggest stop corresponding running mule instance deleting project - steps reproduce: 1 - create project 2 - run mule application 3 - try delete project, including files. error dialog pop up, related mule still using files directories deleted. complete desire delete project, user abort operation (undo undo anything all), stop mule, try again. studio prompt user's consent stop running mule instance one running applications project deleted, delete operation fail, otherwise gets cancelled.

default "auto delete" file endpoint hidden non-usable way - see edit "auto delete" option file connector to: - go end point properties - choose "reference" - add reference global references->connector reference - autodelete option (see attached screenshot)
add jaxb support - would nice could support jaxb operations gui jaxb-xml-to-object-transformer jaxb-context etc.
